mapper.insert: insert into events(eventSeq, userID, summary, description, startDate, endDate) values(eventseq.nextval, #{userID}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select * from events where userID = #{userID} or eventSeq = (select projectSeq from joinProject where userID = #{userID})
mapper.update: update events set summary = #{summary}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate} where eventSeq = #{eventSeq}
